remarks: Statement 13 in [Huneke] p. 2:  "Let p be a prime divisor of k-1; then f(p) = 1 (mod p) [for each vertex v]".  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 7-Oct-2018.)
statement:
numclwwlk.c $e |- C = ( n e. NN0 |-> ( ( V ClWWalksN E ) ` n ) ) $.
numclwwlk.f $e |- F = ( v e. V , n e. NN0 |-> { w e. ( C ` n ) | ( w ` 0 ) = v } ) $.
numclwwlk5 $p |- ( ( ( <. V , E >. RegUSGrph K /\ V FriendGrph E /\ V e. Fin ) /\ ( X e. V /\ P e. Prime /\ P || ( K - 1 ) ) ) -> ( ( # ` ( X F P ) ) mod P ) = 1 ) $.
$d C n v w $.
$d E n v w $.
$d F w $.
$d K v w $.
$d P n v w $.
$d V n v w $.
$d X n v w $.
